abstract: He and his defenders are casting aside a struggling country in the name of short-term political gain.
lead_paragraph: President Trump and his legal team want the American people to believe Ukraine is a corrupt hellhole. That narrative is central to the White House’s impeachment argument. As Mike Purpura, deputy counsel to the president, told the Senate in his opening arguments last Saturday, “The content of the July 25 call was in line with the president’s legitimate concerns about corruption.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
